name: Jimmy L. LINDSEY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Lindsey v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Jimmy L. LINDSEY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of September, 2013, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED and the Application for Leave to File a Reply Brief is DENIED as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
75 A.3d 1279
Jimmy L. LINDSEY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 25, 2013.
